channel.title: Dont know if these are server or client based problems
channel.description:
first off my bank wont save the items once I log out and back in the items are gone
second under my information tab there are clickable links for ingame actions one of them says "exchange Epicurus tokens" and when you click it, it opens up the donator shop and you can purchase items with donator tokens. the problem is I want it to say "exchange Exotic tokens" and I have no idea how to change that ive tried many different forms of searching
ive spent countless hours on google searching for the answer I also posted this same topic under server help incase it is a server related problem
other topic listed here:
[url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,646779.0.html]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,646779.0.html[/url]

item.title: Dont know if these are server or client based problems
item.dc:creator: @Java-RSPS-Noob Java-RSPS-Noob
item.description:
@Java-RSPS-Noob wrote:

1st = server side
2nd = just search for it ~^ unless it’s a custom interface

Read full topic
item.source: Dont know if these are server or client based problems

item.title: Dont know if these are server or client based problems
item.dc:creator: @iRobertTM iRobertTM
item.description:
@iRobertTM wrote:

Sounds like you just need a new source.

Read full topic
